Text.Page:
Who would dare to disturb a god, much less one like Saleron, who's held grudges for centuries?

Everyone—our federation included—wants to seize these crypts, but wouldn't we be better off leaving Saleron alone?

Neither the greatest nor I rule our own destinies, however. So with some reluctance, I offer this challenge: defeat the manaathols and shatter the enemy's command structure.
A worthy victory, <PCNAME>. Let us hope that your effort isn't a pointless advance in these endless tunnels.
